cause.description:
I am participating in the MS Bike tour Sussex-Saint John on July 7th and 8th. I have set a fund raising goal of $5,000.00 To this date I am at $800. i am looking for individual , corporate and matching sponsors.
Follow this link to make your donation:
https://msors.mssociety.ca/bike2007/Sponsor.aspx?L=2&PID=894883
1. We must find a cure for this devastating disease
2. The MS bike tour is held to raise awareness and funds for the fight against MS.
3. there are an estimated 50,000 CAnadians who suffer with MS.
cause.name: To raise $5,000 in the fight against Multiple Sclerosis
